website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive hard hat that comes in more than 20 color choices. Stylish cap style works well.
pros: High density polyethylene material guarantees toughness and durability
Adjustable head band through an easy-to-use knob
Interior components are washable and replaceable
Comfortable padding for all day work
cons: Sits too high on the head for some people

customer_reviews.title: Heads up!!
customer_reviews.text: Received the product quickly. I bought these as a gag gift for myself and our project manager to wear for our remodel, but these are the real deal! The back has a screw that you dial in or out to size the liner. Great quality and will help when that hammer or beam falls in our heads ! I added vinyl letters to the brim to tell them apart.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Buysstuff

customer_reviews.title: Mehhh not good but not terrible
customer_reviews.text: I suppose this is where the whole "you get what you pay for" comes from. I knew it wasn't gonna be great but expected a little better. The reviews are correct about it sitting high so I would recommend adjusting the straps inside so you don't look like a potato. Over all quality is that of a halloween prop but what do you expect from $12. The liner comes out very easily so I will be super gluing it together. All in all I give it about a 5-6 out of 10
customer_reviews.author: Revan J Nix

customer_reviews.title: Not A Good Fit
customer_reviews.text: As some others have noted, the suspension is a problem and the hat sits very high on the head. It did not fit me well at all, so I returned it. I purchased the light green, a nd it was a VERY HIGH visibility green, indeed. In addition to not fitting well and looking rather silly perched so high on my head, the suspension slips out of the fittings when I remove the hat. I guess that is the chance you take when you can't try something on before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Potter

customer_reviews.title: Now I get one in my favorite color.
customer_reviews.text: I worked as an engineer overseeing construction projects. Always had to wear the company colors and logo. Now tht I am retired, I get to wear my favorite color. Damn that is a bright purple. Great hard hat with knob adjust.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Hat
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my mike wazowsky costume and it was perfect for that. The reason I rated it a 4 is because the head thing inside of it poked out the front of the hat which I annoyed me so I took it out and then the hat was obviously way too big and kept falling off. I wish it was not seen when on the head.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Harrison

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this hard hat. I used it for the first time during a 12 hour shift of heavy labor. Every time I took the hard had off the suspension system clips slide right out of the hard hat. The suspension system does not "clip in" to the hard hat securely. The suspension bands came away from the buckles a few times as well, and I had a suspension band hanging in my eye for a while. It was really bad timing, because we could not stop what we were doing for over an hour. If you want to make adjustments to your hard hat ALL day long, this one is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: V. Romanowski

customer_reviews.title: Kept my noggin safe while being on brand!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a couple of these for an upcoming Habitat for Humanity build that we did with my company. I applied my own cut vinyl logo and they looked great. They work great too to protect your head! I got hit by a falling piece of lumber and luckily did not sustain any injury. The inside is fully adjustable for maximum comfort. They were a huge hit!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Becker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister who works in an orchard. She kept getting hit in the head from the fruit. She loves this hardhat. I got bright pink so she could be seen a mile off.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Hamm

customer_reviews.title: I like the color but really nothing else
customer_reviews.text: The suspension sucks. Mine did not sit high on the head but because of how the suspension is my forehead is practically being pushed against the front of the hard hat causing my forehead to hurt just wearing the hat. The suspension also doesn’t stay in well. The sweat band is made of fabric and foam; it causes me to sweat and then doesn’t do a very good job of absorbing the sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I'm buying a new house that's be built, used it as a prop for my pics for my journey but it's a real hard hat. About to adjust the size.
customer_reviews.author: Lissa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a joke for a small construction job at my sisters. But now my boyfriend wears it sometimes on job sites because it’s osha approved certified.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: We used for a Halloween costume and they were comfortable and looked great.
customer_reviews.author: J. Humphreys

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hard hat. The price and quality are wonderful. I use it every day with my electrical business. I love the pink.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: This hard hat has been great - I survived a couple of branches to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Moving into the mountains with a husband who thinks he is a lumberjack (he's not, he's a writer), I figured I needed to get myself some safety gear for our yardwork. This hard hat has been great - I survived a couple of branches to the head, and looked cute doing it. There's a space for a chin strap which you may want to add if you are doing serious work!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice hardhat...suspension should be better quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great hard hat....glows in the dark. You have to let it sit in the sun for several hours for it to glow in the dark. The suspension could be better. The ratcheting device is just okay...I've had better in cheaper hard hats...I wish they all had standard connecting insertion points so you could purchase a better qulaity suspension. However, I do love the glow in the dark. Note: the hat is an almost opaque-white with a green tinge. But, at night, if it sat in the sun for several hours, it turns a bright green.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzzz

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this hard hat! I get lots of compliments. I'm majoring in construction management and need protective gear for some for my classes. My professor told me he used to make students (mostly guys at the time) wear a light pink hard hat he had when they arrived late for class. I told him I would get a pink hat of my own, and I found this one. It's worked great for me. It adjusts well to fit different head sizes and keeps me protected. The color pictured is accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Voyles

customer_reviews.title: Works for me...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this so I can make a Deadmau5 costume for Halloween this year. It arrived and fits well. I also like the ratchet feature to make quick adjustments versus having to take it off and adjust a strap or something. I don't consider myself to have a big head but perhaps the straps aren't long enough, but it seems to sit high on the head but what do I know about fitment of hard hats? Hopefully construction workers or others who can compare this against other models can provide feedback pertaining to depth of the hat. All in all for what I'm going to be using it for, it works just fine and is a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: A. Santos

customer_reviews.title: Odds are you know what to expect
customer_reviews.text: I really just bought this to take the liner out, but if you decide to use it, it’s a good hard hat. I’ve worn an orange one since 2008, just bought this to steal the inside harness out. For some reason it’s cheaper than buying the harness itself.
customer_reviews.author: David Pawlak

customer_reviews.title: finally a helmet that stays on!
customer_reviews.text: good helmet, suspension and helmet work well with strap to actually stay on my head, not fall off with any little turn. And I actually rarely use the strap because it stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our company thank you
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and product very fast shipping to Hawaii will order again for my coworkers
customer_reviews.author: JV

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be smaller
customer_reviews.text: I have a very small head, so I couldn't tighten it enough to where it wouldn't fall off when I bend over. Small womenn do construction too so they should think about making them a little bit smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Willie and Paula Maynard

customer_reviews.title: Stand out
customer_reviews.text: I hate that everyone has the same two color hard hats, so it's great to stand out from the crowd
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I’m an appraiser and use it for new construction walk through. Works good for me. Great price
customer_reviews.author: danielle

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Item came with no rachet or fittings to adjust hat.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Dirk-Halley

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: Heavy enough to stay put, light enough to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Smith

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love my hard hat. Easy to adjust and hey, if you have to wear a hard hat, at least your stylin in pink :)
customer_reviews.author: Angelique

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: this will match my costume perfectly def not cheap material...love it
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A Bourque

customer_reviews.title: good deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: Well, it does its job. I didn't want the regular white hardhat, I was the only female on site and wanted to avoid the pink color. good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Silvia Manca

customer_reviews.title: FEMALE PURCHASER
customer_reviews.text: I really don’t have any complaints about this hat. The fit and color are wonderful. Purple is my favorite color in this is the shade I like!
customer_reviews.author: MzHolliWudKitti

customer_reviews.title: Good safety product
customer_reviews.text: This looks like a good product . I will be using it for my CERT program
customer_reviews.author: Chris Mathews

customer_reviews.title: and that was very good.
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased because of the earthquake poised for the area where we live, the Northwest Oregon area, and have not been warn other than trying it out for fit, and that was very good.
customer_reviews.author: Royal

customer_reviews.title: Nice hard hat
customer_reviews.text: Nice hard hat with a touch of femininity. I love the pink color! It does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: I love this hard hat
customer_reviews.text: I love this hard hat. I bought it for my volunteer construction work job and everyone loved its adorable pink color.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: It makes me look like a super dork on the build site
customer_reviews.text: Other reviewers have mentioned that this hat sits very high on the head - so true. It makes me look like a super dork on the build site, but at least it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT HELMET!!!!
customer_reviews.text: great hard hat, clean sharp color, good insides as well and the best part is the swivel back piece that allows you to adjust it where u want it behind your head.... think of when u put on a baseball cap and u tug the rear of the cap to set it where u want it on the back of ur head.... this product has the same feel.... most comfy hard hat ive ever worn and ive worn a few.....
customer_reviews.author: mattmma22

customer_reviews.title: Lopsided potato
customer_reviews.text: Way too big for my head, straps slide out easily and need to constantly be reinserted.
customer_reviews.author: K377B377

customer_reviews.title: just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: just a good old hard hat. got this for my girlfriend, it was her color and her shade of purple, just like a regular hard hat with all the stuff that a regular hard hat comes with and just regular good quality, i figured since it was purple the quality was not going to be as great but nope! it was great! no complaints! for that alone it gets a 5 star!
customer_reviews.author: isaac8480

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: As other have said, it sits high on the head and isn't the most comfortable hat. But you get what you pay for. Get alot of compliments about it being glow in the dark. Glows great though
customer_reviews.author: paul luna

customer_reviews.title: Can be used as a part of a costume or prop!!
customer_reviews.text: This hat was used as a prop for a campaign and was a success. My daughter ended up winning her position. The hat was durable, comfortable and was and added bonus for her prop. Perfect color!!
customer_reviews.author: sweetiepie24

customer_reviews.title: Sunday's Best
customer_reviews.text: This is a good complement to any color coordinated safety gear.
customer_reviews.author: Hi Tech Dad

customer_reviews.title: Great value!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hat for the price. My face shield bracket fits perfectly. I love the ability to quickly adjust the size. I can quickly go from a skull cap to bare head and back.
customer_reviews.author: R. Gautney

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I've chosen this hat because I really wanted the Lime/Green color not knowing anything about hard hats really. After I have put it on I felt the comfort that I haven't felt from other hard hats I've put on. The only thing about the hat that I do not like is that it doesn't come with the wents on top so if you are in humid hot environment you will swet alot faster than if your hat had wents, but all and all, I don't wear it often so dont mind a little sweat. I would recommend this product for someone who doesnt have to wear it more than 2 hours a day.
customer_reviews.author: 0tt0

customer_reviews.title: Useful too
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is doing a lot of home reconstruction and I thought this would be useful plus decorated a cute gag gift For Christmas. Thank you so much h for the selection of colors
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive protection
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive, decent quality for the money and keeps us Osha compliant.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff's Auto Repair

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was having issues finding a hard hat that was the right size. This one fits wonderfully and the adjuster on the band is very easy to use. My husband had me order him one in blue. An added bonus is there is band of cushion/padding around the front so it doesn't dig into your forehead, which is removeable and machine washable. The picture is very true to color.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: good looking safety hat for the boss!!
customer_reviews.text: ohhh yea! perfect pink safety hat for the boss! she thinks its great!
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: Value found here
customer_reviews.text: Excellent hard hat. No issues at all, I’d buy it sgain.
customer_reviews.author: RichardF

customer_reviews.title: It's Good -- and it's pink
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted a pink hard hat. And I found it. The quality is as expected. The value (price I paid) is very good. The internal adjustments do the job. I think I'd buy a nicer model if it was being worn 8 hours a day... but this is a very sufficient helmet for most applications. Overall I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have very high expectations for this product because of the price. But this is surpassed my expectations. Very durable, very comfortable and very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the job its designed for
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the job its designed for, comfortable pad in head band. Wish there were optional stickers that came with like hearts or animals or something cute.
customer_reviews.author: Taylormade

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: This is a good hardhat. The twist adjust function is the only way to go. If you care about looks, the front of the hat is taller and more square than other hardhats, which looks a little wierd. I reversed the liner to wear it backwards. Some contractors don't like to see that, but it functions very well. Overall, a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tone

customer_reviews.title: FEMALE PURCHASER
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the color. I guess her head is a little smaller than what the ratchet goes down to but other than that she loved it. She’s 16.
customer_reviews.author: MzHolliWudKitti

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It is a great hard hat. I work in a coil warehouse and it passes all the safety levels needed. And I've been complemented many times. You don't see many colored hard hats lol
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Stays put & is comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Who says hard hats don't stay on? I was able to adjust it to fit perfectly and it held on for a full night of swing dancing. Yes, I purchased this for a Halloween costume and went dancing in it after adding an elastic chin strap with a D ring for insurance. It was comfortable, and I was able to do fast "spot turns" without a slip. The gold shovel I had strapped to my back was another story...
customer_reviews.author: Monica B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife. Fits her well. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Southbaydude

customer_reviews.title: They went together easily and quickly and they fit all the heads
customer_reviews.text: The hard hats we ordered were for a tour of a building under construction - we used them one time. They went together easily and quickly and they fit all the heads, large and small, that were there. The product seemed well made and priced right.
customer_reviews.author: Sue K.

customer_reviews.title: buy it
customer_reviews.text: great hard hat very affordable and comfortable. smart design very lightweight. throw it off the ladder all the time and ratchet still works perfectly, unlike other hats.
customer_reviews.author: SQUiD808

customer_reviews.title: The perfect gift for my co-worker
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. The perfect gift for my co-worker!
customer_reviews.author: Mercene S.

customer_reviews.title: My safety hat.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for using in case of Tornado or severe weather time that we have to shelter in the bathroom shower stall to protect the head. Will feel safer now. Thank you for this product.
customer_reviews.author: MUFFIN

customer_reviews.title: Great Protection
customer_reviews.text: Working security in a building under construction is a hazard. This hard hat came in handy for all the long hours walking around. Comfortable to wear, easily adjustable. Standard & custom stickers to identify staff stick easily. A quick wipe and clean for the next use.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan D. Manning

customer_reviews.title: ERB hard hat
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent hard hat. I have used many types over the years and before I bought this I did a lot of research. I have purchased other ERB items and they are good quality. This is exactly what I wanted and at a good price. It shipped fast and arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Hertsch

customer_reviews.title: Nice color choice - fits well.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a KSU fan, so had to have the purple hard hat for the occasional times that I need one. Fits well at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Duane D McGuire

customer_reviews.title: I had men trying to buy it from me. ...
customer_reviews.text: I had men trying to buy it from me. Everyone is crazy about this hat. Was a success for my first dry dock!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Mihalache

customer_reviews.title: Pink is for boys, too!  Great buy for my son!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves pink, and he wanted a pink hard hat like the one my supervisor had in her office. He got it! He's only 4, so it's only for play, but we're still very satisfied customers!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Thiel

customer_reviews.title: Item good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I paid extra for a ship date that did not happen. Was to arrive on Friday for a party and arrived on a different date as promised. Item good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Komrosky

customer_reviews.title: I like it and they will forget they are wearing them ...
customer_reviews.text: My sups stand out in the yard now. I like it and they will forget they are wearing them eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Delta-9

customer_reviews.title: Good put a Boston B on front. Go Boston Redsox!
customer_reviews.text: Good put a Boston B on front. Go Boston Redsox!
customer_reviews.author: The BowdMan

customer_reviews.title: Working on a hotel project and this was a great option when too many people were borrowing hats
customer_reviews.text: Working on a hotel project and this was a great option when too many people were borrowing hats. A perfect hat that will never get borrowed!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Young

customer_reviews.title: Love the hat and color
customer_reviews.text: A very well fitting hat. It is very easy to adjust with the dial control at the back. It's most comfortable, especially with the foam headband at the front.....and the color gets a lot of comments too. Not too many purple hard hats on a work site.
customer_reviews.author: California Shopper

customer_reviews.title: good fit - nice quality
customer_reviews.text: My son needed a very specific type of safety feature in a hard hat and this fit the bill. He said it's comfortable and I would recommend ordering extra brow liners. Hopefully we'll never have to find out how well it protects from impact!
customer_reviews.author: B. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Meets the majority of the safety requirements!
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet! Very comfortable. It's easy to adjust the tension with the rachet knob. Meets our safety requirements.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this Hat!! I work construction. No problem seeing me
customer_reviews.author: Sandra D. Harris

customer_reviews.title: So far makes for great melon protection.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter who started to remodel a house with her boyfriend.
customer_reviews.author: Gatlin

customer_reviews.title: Changed my mind
customer_reviews.text: I'm changing my review. After adjusting the head gear straps on the inside I was able to set the hat down on my head it actually looks and feels great
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: but it was really nice and my husband said it was the real thing
customer_reviews.text: we used it for halloween, but it was really nice and my husband said it was the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: D. Oakes

customer_reviews.title: It is comfortable and worked great
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased to mount my GoPro camera on. It is comfortable and worked great!!! I really like the ease of adjustment of this hard hat!!!
customer_reviews.author: James Southard

customer_reviews.title: this green i chose is also a perfect match to my semi truck
customer_reviews.text: this green i chose is also a perfect match to my semi truck, very comfortable, fits perfect, the adjuster on it is so easy to use, this hat is amazing, i give this hard-hat 25 stars
customer_reviews.author: steve buckhanan

customer_reviews.title: Very Uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable! Sent it back. The return went smoothly though so I gave it two stars.
customer_reviews.author: JMartinez

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this hard hat for my wife because she wanted a brown one. Not only is the color good she says it is more comfortable than what she had before. It is lightweight and the suspension system works well. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: L.C.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift and the person loved it..sturdy construction and very adjustable..exactly what was needed!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Schilling

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits good. Was happy about all the different colors you could piclk
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: Very Pink
customer_reviews.text: Bought this hat in "fluorescent pink" and fluorescent it is! If you don't want to draw attention to the fact that you're a female on a construction site then stay away, otherwise I highly recommend this product, the guys always got a kick out of it. My only complaint is the hat sits kind of high on your head.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth C

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on behalf of someone else and I'm assuming they are satisfied with it because they have not returned it to me.
customer_reviews.author: MyReviews

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly other than one of the clasps for the webbing constantly coming unplugged. Small annoyance.
customer_reviews.author: David Brown

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: This was another product that was on the donation list for Sea Shepherd which I donated for their engine room. Its a good solid product and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: I received it just as it was in the ad. I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Jim McClendon

customer_reviews.title: Nice!!
customer_reviews.text: No thing wrong with this hard hat is nice and easy to adjust to your head size
customer_reviews.author: Sokiokira

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good hat, does the job. Ratchet helps it stay on.
customer_reviews.author: Construction pro

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet, very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: There isn't much to say about this product other than it does what it says and its well made and up to standards. The ratchet suspension is the only way to go. Also if you wear the light blue shirt and dark blue pants like my company, it looks good with your uniform. I recommend this product to anyone in need of a simple no frills hard hat, plus you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse L. Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Sets To High On Head
customer_reviews.text: The hat may be nice and the ratchet adjustment may work well, but; the hat sets way too high on my head. Other reviewers have mentioned the same. Sadly there is no adjustment in the nylon webbing that would allow the hat to set lower. If you are doing something that causes you to have to look up or down, the hat is not likely to stay on your head. I'll have to go to Home Depot and see if the ratchet insert model they sell will fit this hat. Otherwise, I won't bother wearing this one and will be looking for a better hat. At least it is cheap enough.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Ranger

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister who likes brown. I decorated it with her name and some butterfly stickers. We are working to learn T-bar installation and her other hard hat didn't fit well. I really like the suspension in these.
customer_reviews.author: Pamala Collins

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE COLOR PICTURED
customer_reviews.text: It is dark green. I returned this twice :/ It is very frustrating not to get a safety item when you actually need it.
customer_reviews.author: Honest1

customer_reviews.title: Flat Front for Decals
customer_reviews.text: Nice flat-front hard hat if you have a company decal to apply.
customer_reviews.author: metric or sae

customer_reviews.title: It's a hard hat
customer_reviews.text: Just fine if you don't find fingerprints all over it all the time
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Love this Hard Hat!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to protect my noggin when I go out to cut trees. Glad I did, it kept me from a nasty bump on the head.
customer_reviews.author: Steffney L. Pearce

customer_reviews.title: where are the matching safety glasses!?
customer_reviews.text: its a cheap hat, but it works for us! the glasses never came????
customer_reviews.author: Marymary

customer_reviews.title: Safe
customer_reviews.text: My husband is so happy with this product, he was very excited when he received his order, he could not belive the price compared to other dep stores. This was a great deal
customer_reviews.author: patticia lechuga

customer_reviews.title: This hard hat is perfect. The swivel strap definitely helps for comfort
customer_reviews.text: This hard hat is perfect. The swivel strap definitely helps for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: JJohns

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: Very nice fit and loved the color. It had several scratches on it.
customer_reviews.author: Monte Mom

customer_reviews.title: good basic hard hat!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a great value. It will be used on construction.
customer_reviews.author: Raphaela Schraufnagel

product_meta.title: ERB 19948 Omega II Cap Style Hard Hat with Mega Ratchet, Flourescent Yellow
product_meta.description:
Color:Flourescent YellowThe Omega II features a full 6-point woven nylon suspension and accommodated a chin strap as well. The suspension has retaining slots of your goggles and this hat features a moisture wicking brow pad that is removable, washable and replaceable. Our accessory slots accommodate a wide variety of eye, face and hearing products. This helmet is certified when the headband is installed in the reverse position. This hats color meets the chromaticity and luminance requirements for background material in ANSI/SEA 107. The Mega Ratchet secure-fit features an easy turn knob that allows size adjustment without removing the helmet. Each turn of the ratchet knob automatically lock with 50 meshing teeth securing the position. The no-slip hold maintains the desired fit even in the most physically active jobs or extreme weather conditions. The hinged ratchet fits low on the nape of the neck and is height-adjustable for a perfect fit. The ratchet mechanism is cushioned with a thick sponge padding for long-lasting comfort. This hard hat is SEI Certified.
